data.name: Undead
data.description:
The Chaos - Undead [R]
Units:
-30% buy cost
-30% buy cooldown
-12% damage
-2 armor

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
-5% cost

Magic:
Raise Dead (Raises Skeleton Warrior for 20s)
Frost Armor (+4 cold armor to friendly unit)
Frost Nova (Deals 90 damage and slows for 5s)

Traits: Quantity over quality. With the exception of a few dedicated damage sponges, most units are very weak and depend on high numbers rather than strength. Try to spawn them often.

Difficulty: Expert

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+1 HP/s building regeneration
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Cursed Lands
auras.description:
+750 decay aura range

Base Defence Aura

auras.name: Possessing Spirits
auras.description:
30% to summon Shadow on kill
(affects Heroes only)

Unique Aura

bonuses.name: The King is Back! [Q]
bonuses.description:
Thebis'Ahn replaces Bonelord

Special Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Scorpion infection (Summoning/Passive Skill)
summons 2 Scorpions for 60-90 sec
(10-16% for summon 1 on kill)

Screech (Disable Spell)
22-40% damage reduction
(affects organic units only)
(30 second cooldown)

Acid Splash (Damage Spell)
15-45 dmg/s, 4-10 armor penalty
(60 second cooldown)

Great Impale (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9s stun
(45 second cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Nerubian Corruptor [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Web

Corruptor replaces Crypt Fiend
Ranged Unit
+20% attack rate
+75 HP
Abilities:
Parasite (Summoning Spell)
(10 dmg, spawn 1 Scarab for 60 sec)
(infected lasts for 60 sec)
(affects non-Hero units)
Acid Spitball (Damage Spell)
(400 damage to Air unit)
Upgrades used:
Unholy Strength
Unholy Armor
Web
Light Weight

Type: Strong Anti Air / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Heap of Flesh [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Disease Cloud

Flesh Giant replaces Meat Wagon
Siege Unit (Melee)
+60% attack rate
+1200 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:
Carrion Swarm (Damage Spell)
(125 damage in a line)
Spell Resistance (Passive Skill)
(60% spell damage reduction)
(25% to block an attack)
Upgrades used:
Unholy Strength
Unholy Armor
Disease Cloud
Corruption Aura

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: The Dragonblight [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Soul Rip

Frost Wyrm replaces Gargoyle
Air Unit
+5% attack rate
+100 range
+8 damage
Abilities:
Dragon Heritage (Passive Skill)
(has Chaos attack type)
Freezing Aura (Disable Spell)
(-15% attack speed in 700 AoE)
(affects buildings as well)
Upgrades used:
Unholy Strength
Unholy Armor
Light Weight

Type: Air Power / Anti Building

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Death Knight [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Corruption Aura
+1 level of Impenetrable Flesh

Death Knight replaces Abomination
Siege Unit
+100 HP
+2 armor
Abilities:
Death Coil (Support Spell)
(restores 50-125 HP to 1 friendly unit)
(if enemy is a target, deals 50-125 dmg instead)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Unholy Aura (Support Aura)
(+2 HP/sec in 500 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Corruption Aura (Upgrades Abilities)
Unholy Strength
Unholy Armor
Disease Cloud
Impenetrable Flesh
Life Steal

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Sphinx [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Light Weight

Sphinx replaces Gargoyle
Air Unit
+150 HP
+10% attack rate
Abilities:
Magic Surge (Orb Effect)
(deals 35 dmg in 200 AoE on attack)
(costs 50 mana)
Gory Kill (Passive Skill)
(scare units on kill in 200 AoE)
Devour Magic (Disable Spell)
(dispels any buffs in AoE)
(restores 30 mana for each)
Upgrades used:
Unholy Strength
Unholy Armor
Light Weight

Type: Air Power / Anti Buff

bonuses.name: Howling Banshees [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Crippling Frost
+1 level of Dead Animation

Banshee replaces Necromancer
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Dark Spirit (Sumonning Spell)
(1/2/3/4 spirits for 25 sec)
Upgrades used:
Necromancy (Upgrades Abilities)
Unholy Armor
Crippling Frost
Dead Animation

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: The Frozen Throne [W]
bonuses.description:
The Frozen Throne calls for it's best champions to come!

Type: Hero Power / Unique Bonus

bonuses.name: Advanced Necromancy [C]
bonuses.description:
The Scourge gained access to many powerful sources of necrotic power, which in turn made their casters capable of raising even more undead soldiers!

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Advanced Necromancy
spells.description:
Choose which Cult will support you in battle. Beware that you can only choose one, as there isn't enough resource for all of them to assist you. All of the cults have 4 tiers of Necrotic powers to unlock in due time. The cult reaches tier 1 as soon as Dead Animation is researched

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Cult of the Cold Steel
spells.description:
+10% attack rate
+12 damage
Once Dead Animation is researched, Scholar of Decay will spawn with each wave. He can summon Skeleton Warriors and Archers

Type: Anti Mechanical

spells.name: Cult of the Dreadful Strength
spells.description:
+2 armor
+6 HP regeneration
Once Dead Animation is researched, Blood Master will spawn with each wave. He can summon Skeleton Warriors

Type: Strength Power

spells.name: Cult of the Accursed Knowledge
spells.description:
+15% spell resist
+2 MP/sec regen
Once Dead Animation is researched, Unholy Necromancer will spawn with each wave. He can summon Skeleton Mages

Type: Magic Power

bonuses.name: Zombie [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Life Steal

Zombie replaces Ghoul
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
2x unit spawn
-50% HP
Abilities:
Infectious Bite (Orb Power)
(10% to infect an enemy)
(affects organic units only)
(summons Zombie on death)
Neurotic Toxins (Passive Spell)
(deals 15 dmg on death in 175 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Unholy Strength
Unholy Armor
Disease Cloud
Life Steal
Impenetrable Flesh (only spell resist)

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Blood Mage [X]
bonuses.description:
Talnos replaces Kel'Thuzad

Hero Unit (Ranged)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Nuker

Talnos does not have abilities, but you can cast 12 different spells from bonus building. When Talnos gets 4/8/14 level, you get additional spells unlocked. The spells can be cast even if Talnos is stunned or silenced.

towerUpgrades.name: Life Steal
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: life steal ability
Affects: Ghoul and Abomination
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 20% of dealt damage
Lv2: 30% of dealt damage
Lv3: 40% of dealt damage
Lv4: 50% of dealt damage

towerUpgrades.name: Disease Cloud
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage/sec in 150 AoE
Affects: Ghoul and Abomination

Lv1: 8 damage per second
Lv2: 16 damage per second
Lv3: 24 damage per second
Lv4: 32 damage per second

towerUpgrades.name: Light Weight
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion and bonus HP
Affects: All Summons and Skeletons

Lv1: +5% evasion, +30 HP
Lv2: +10% evasion, +60 HP
Lv3: +15% evasion, +90 HP
Lv4: +20% evasion, +120 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Web
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to immobilize units
Affects: Crypt Fiend
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: lasts 10 seconds, +4 damage
Lv2: lasts 20 seconds, +8 damage
Lv3: lasts 30 seconds, +12 damage
Lv4: lasts 40 seconds, +16 damage

spells.name: Web (Lv1)
spells.description:
Binds a target enemy air unit in webbing, forcing it to the ground. Webbed units can be hit as though they were land units.
Lasts seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Corruption Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces enemy armor
Affects: Abomination
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: -2 armor in 400 AoE
Lv2: -4 armor in 500 AoE
Lv3: -6 armor in 600 AoE
Lv4: -8 armor in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Impenetrable Flesh
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack block and spell resistance
Affects: Abomination

Lv1: 6% to block, -15% spell damage
Lv2: 12% to block, -30% spell damage
Lv3: 18% to block, -45% spell damage
Lv4: 24% to block, -60% spell damage

towerUpgrades.name: Crippling Frost
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: slows targeted unit
Affects: Necromancer and Ziggurat
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 5% slow for 10 seconds
Lv2: 10% slow for 12 seconds
Lv3: 15% slow for 14 seconds
Lv4: 20% slow for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Dead Animation
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: improves raise dead ability
Affects: Necromancer
(each level upgrades Archer arrows)

Lv1: +7 sec duration, -10% mana cost
can raise one Skeleton Archer
(has several different arrows)
Lv2: +14 sec duration, -20% mana cost
can raise one Skeletal Mage
(can use Frost Armor and Frost Nova)
Lv3: +21 sec duration, -30% mana cost
can raise two Skeleton Archers
Lv4: +28 sec duration, -40% mana cost
can raise two Skeleton Warriors

towerUpgrades.name: Soul Rip
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: restore mana to Necropolis
Affects: Killed enemy Heroes
(affects organic Heroes only)

Lv1: +10 mana for a kill
Lv2: +20 mana for a kill
Lv3: +30 mana for a kill
Lv4: +40 mana for a kill

t1spell.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Howling Ghosts [X]
t2spell.description:
Creates a swarm of angry spirits.
Lasts 30 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.description:

Can train Special Unit
+5000 Necropolis hit points

skills.description:

skills.description:
Creates a swarm of angry spirits.

skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Crippling Frost (Lv1)
skills.description:
Slows target by 5% for 10 seconds.

(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

heroes.name: Death Knight
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Plague (Orb Effect)
10-70% to spawn Zombie on kill
(affects organic units only)
(40 second life)

Death Coil (Healing Spell)
200-500 HP to 3 units
(25 second cooldown)

Vampiric Aura (Support Aura)
18-30% melee lifesteal
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Animate Dead (Summoning Spell)
raises 3-9 units for 60-90s
(90-120 second cooldown)

skills.name: Death Coil - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Animate Dead - [Level 1]
skills.description: Raises 3 dead units in an area to fight for the you for 60 seconds.

heroes.name: Dark Ranger
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Disabler

Can learn:
Silence (Disable Spell)
silences for 26-50s
(200-350 area of effect)
(36-60 second cooldown)

Curse of the Banshee (Orb Effect)
10-70% to spawn Abomination on kill
(affects organic units only)
(40 second life)

Stunning Arrow (Disable Spell)
200-500 damage, 3-6 second stun
(affects Heroes only)
(30 second cooldown)

Banshee Queen (Damage Spell)
10-70% bonus AS, 20-80 dmg every 0.2s
(lasts 10s)
(60 second cooldown)

skills.name: Silence - [Level 4]
skills.description: Stops all enemies in a target area from casting spells for <ANsi,Dur1> seconds.

skills.name: Fire Bolt 1 lvl
skills.description: Stuns units for 3 seconds (Hero 1.5s)

skills.name: Berserk - [Level 1]
skills.description: Causes this unit to attack 10% faster.

heroes.name: Prime Lich
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Can learn:
Frost Nova (Damage Spell)
200-350 damage, 10% slow
(200-350 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(30 second cooldown)

9-15% attack, move slow
(affects organic units only)

9-15% attack, move slow
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Ice Prison (Disable Spell)
14-26 second stun
(350-650 area of effect)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(84-96 second cooldown)

skills.name: Frost Nova - [Level 4]
skills.description: Blasts enemy units with a wave of frost that deals <AUfn,DataB4> damage to the target, and <AUfn,DataA4> nova damage. Cold damage slows units' movement and attack rate for <AUfn,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Ice Prison - [Level 1]
skills.description: Stuns for 14 seconds.

heroes.name: The Skeleton Lord
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Vile Wave (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage, 3-9s stun
(750-900 wave distance)
(45 second cooldown)

12-30% damage, -8-14 armor in 600 AoE
(30 second cooldown)

4-10 HP/s regeneration bonus
(affects organic units only)

8 ghosts for 15-27 seconds
(60 second cooldown)

skills.name: Great Eruption - [Level 1]
skills.description: Deals 250 damage and stuns for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Fear the Reaper
skills.description: Reduces nearby enemy unit's damage by 12% for 30 seconds.

skills.name: Arcane Aura - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases nearby friendly units' life regeneration by 6 HP/sec.

skills.name: Howling Ghosts - [Level 3]
skills.description:
Creates a swarm of angry spirits that drain the life energies of nearby enemy units. They store the life energy they drain from their victims and use it to replenish Rokhan's hit points when they return.
Lasts seconds.
